Comments: Name of the project underwhich the experiment was carried out
Encripted vessel identifier. ID encrypted so that no-one can map the ID to the real vessel
Identifier of the trip for a given project and vessel
Sequential numbering of hauls. Starting by 1 for each new trial
Identify the subgear (for twin protocol) or the gear (for paired/unpaired protocol): STD for Standard gear or TEST for experimental gear
The intended usage at the time of landing.
Commercial sorting category in the given scale.
If different subsampling is applied within the catch (e.g. in the DIS fraction).
Lower bound of the length class in mm (e.g. 650 for 65-66 cm)
Not raised to the whole catch. Length classes with zero should be excluded from the record
Mesure type : "LT" for Total Length and "LC" for Carapace Length
Elevated number of individuals for the length class.
